类 Feedback

java.lang.Object
com.shapeville.model.Feedback
public class Feedback extends Object
Represents the feedback provided to the user after they submit an answer to a task problem. It contains information about the correctness of the answer, points earned, a message, the correct answer (if needed), and flags to control the task flow (proceed to next problem or task type complete).

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Feedback

      public Feedback(boolean correct, int pointsEarned, String message, String correctAnswerToDisplay, boolean proceedToNextProblem, boolean taskTypeComplete)
      Constructs a new Feedback object.
      参数:
      correct - True if the user's answer was correct, false otherwise.
      pointsEarned - The number of points earned for this attempt.
      message - A textual message providing feedback to the user.
      correctAnswerToDisplay - The correct answer to display to the user, or null if not applicable.
      proceedToNextProblem - True if the task should proceed to the next problem after this feedback, false otherwise.
      taskTypeComplete - True if completing this problem means the entire task type is finished, false otherwise.

  • 方法详细资料

    • isCorrect

      public boolean isCorrect()
      Checks if the user's answer was correct.
      返回:
      True if the answer was correct, false otherwise.

    • getPointsEarned

      public int getPointsEarned()
      Gets the number of points earned for this attempt.
      返回:
      The points earned.

    • getMessage

      public String getMessage()
      Gets the textual feedback message.
      返回:
      The feedback message.

    • getCorrectAnswerToDisplay

      public String getCorrectAnswerToDisplay()
      Gets the correct answer to display to the user.
      返回:
      The correct answer string, or null if not applicable.

    • shouldProceedToNextProblem

      public boolean shouldProceedToNextProblem()
      Checks if the task should proceed to the next problem after this feedback.
      返回:
      True if the task should proceed, false otherwise.

    • isTaskTypeComplete

      public boolean isTaskTypeComplete()
      Checks if this feedback signifies the completion of the entire task type.
      返回:
      True if the task type is complete, false otherwise.
